name: UFGFoliageResourceUserData
comment: Copyright 2016 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

methods.name: GetLookAtText
methods.comment: Text describing what you will get when you pickup the foliage

methods.name: IdentifiesWith
methods.comment:
Return true if mFoliageIdentifiers contains any item that is a subclass of identifier
@return true if identifier is nullptr

methods.name: MeshHasIdentifier
methods.comment:
@param identifier - the identifier we want to check if the mesh has, nullptr means it has a UFGFoliageResourceUserData
@return false if mesh is nullptr, true identifier is null, also if the mesh doesn't have any UFGFoliageResourceUserData

methods.name: GetExplosionDestroyedEffect
methods.comment: Returns the first defined effect starting from most desirable, mExplosionDestroyedEffect working down to mPickupEffect

properties.name: mPickupItems
properties.comment: Items we should gain when picking up the item, @todo: Remove BlueprintReadOnly

properties.name: mPickupEvent
properties.comment: Audio event to be posted when picked up, @todo: Remove BlueprintReadOnly

properties.name: mPickupEffect
properties.comment: The effect to play where the pickup was, @todo: Remove BlueprintReadOnly

properties.name: mVehicleDestroyedEvent
properties.comment: Audio event to be posted when run over by a vehicle, @todo: Remove BlueprintReadOnly

properties.name: mVehicleDestroyedEffect
properties.comment: The effect to play when run over by a vehicle, @todo: Remove BlueprintReadOnly

properties.name: mExplosionDestroyedEffect
properties.comment: The effect to play when destroyed by an explosive. If one is not specified it may fall back to either the vehicle effect or pickup effect

properties.name: mFXPriority
properties.comment: Specifies priority for spawning against other effects. Must be implemented by the spawning class. ex: FGDestructiveProjectile

properties.name: mFoliageIdentifiers
properties.comment: What does this foliage identify itself as
